name: Pentio
description:
The game is in Spanish. The reason is that currently the translator may not have much time available ... sorry

A Cantabrian, returns home after a day of hunting. The scenario is it Dante, his people burned, people killed, his missing family. Only an old man reveals what happened ...

This is the context in which your adventure begins by the Cantabrian land, trying to get your family, many adventure and puzzles then maybe get your goal, who knows them ?.

Spanish

Un Cántabro, regresa a su hogar después de una jornada de caza. El escenario que se encuentra resulta dantesco, su pueblo incendiado, su gente asesinada, su familia desaparecida. Sólo un anciano le revela lo acontecido…

Este es el contexto en el que se inicia tu aventura por las tierras Cántabras, tratando de recuperar a tú familia, muchas aventura y puzzles después tal vez consigas tu objetivo, ¿Quien los sabe?.
